name: Women's Trim
description: Maintain strong and healthy hair with a trim.

name: Women's Cut
description: Women's cut, detail and price may vary depending on hair type or length.

name: All Over Color
description: Give your color a full reset with all over color change.

name: Single Process Color
description: Lift and color your hair in one easy step.

name: Bleach and Tone
description: Bleach to lift your existing color and toner to keep your hue cool, calm, and collected.

name: Full Balayage
description: Lightening technique where highlights are painted tip to root for a blended, sun-kissed brightness

name: Full Foil Highlights
description: Brighten your hair with a full head of highlights. We'll part your hair into sections and place 50 to 100 foils for sun-kissed dimension

name: Double Process Color
description: When you want to go twice as light. First the hair is bleached to remove your natural color, then toned to match the shade you're going for.

name: Relaxer
description: Smooth and straighten curls with a relaxer.

name: Shampoo and Style
description: It's all in the name. Enjoy a shampoo, blow dry, and style.

name: Twist Out
description: Add body to your hair naturally. We'll twist sections of your hair, let them dry, and uncoil for bounce all over.

name: Braids
description: We'll talk about what look you want and bring your braids to life. No extension, just your natural hair.

name: Flat Iron
description: Get your hair silky smooth and straight with a flat iron.

name: Natural Flexi Rods
description: Add body and bounce to your hair with flexi rods for curls that lasts for days.

name: Loc Re-twist
description: Incorporate new hair growth and touch up existing twists for polished locs.

name: Crochet Braids
description: Stylish and protective. We'll attach extensions through your natural hair for a full-bodied look.

name: Box Braids
description: Protective and trendy, this braid style parts sections of your hair in boxes for a tiled pattern part and even braids.

name: Takedown
description: It's all in the name. Safely take down your hairstyle so you can start fresh.
